trans-unit.source: Indicates that a collection type should be processed as being whitespace significant by a XAML processor.
trans-unit.target: Indica que um tipo de coleção deve ser processado considerando espaços em branco por um processador de XAML.

trans-unit.source: `xml:space` is a related concept that influences XAML processing of white space but is orthogonal to the purpose of <xref:System.Windows.Markup.WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: `xml:space` é um conceito relacionado que influencia o processamento de XAML de espaço em branco, mas é ortogonal para a finalidade de <xref:System.Windows.Markup.WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Whitespace Processing in XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/whitespace-processing-in-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [processamento de espaço em branco em XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/whitespace-processing-in-xaml.md).

trans-unit.source: In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase.
trans-unit.target: Nas versões anteriores do .NET Framework, essa classe existia no assembly específicos de WPF WindowsBase.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Markup.WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute> is in the System.Xaml assembly.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Markup.WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute> está no assembly System. XAML.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tipos migrados do WPF para System. XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection> is an example [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] class where this attribute is applied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineCollection> é um exemplo [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] classe onde esse atributo é aplicado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute" />.
